Reviews.Title: Excellent camera and kit
Reviews.Author: amazon buyer
Reviews.Content: I recieved the kit in good condition and ships fast. This kit has all the essentials for the D5200. I was suspicious about the quality of the other items in the kit, but everything is good quality. The tripod was good and sturdy. The tripod provides upto 5 feet of height which is plenty.The D5200 is exceptional and shoots razor sharp images. The color depth is really good. I have always rated Sony as a good color depth camera, but the 5200 is exceptional.I love the autofocus feature and the servo motor is on the lens system rather than the body of the camera.Movie mode is really good and you can set an autofocus for movie mode which will refocus automatically with a moving object.Burst mode take pics with a speed of 5 frames a second.The lens system has vibration reduction option to minimize blurs.This is one of the very few kits with the 64GB card option.Overall an excellent value for the price.You can get the D5200 kit in Sams's club for like $979  but it comes with a 16GB card and with a wi-fi adapter. The 16GB card is not sufficient and also the wi-fi adapter is useful only in wi-fi areas. Not very useful. Then you will end up buying a 64GB card and the other items for about $200+shipping.This kit is the bang for the buck.

Reviews.Title: The camera is fantastic
Reviews.Author: A. Wang
Reviews.Content: What I didn't find so great was the off-brand accessories are not high quality and frankly mostly useless for my purposes.  I should have saved my money and stayed away from such bundles.Note that the latest firmware is supposed to render non-Nikon batteries unusable.  Thank you Nikon.Otherwise, the pix are really great.  I took a picture of a helicopter about 100m away with a 18-200 lens (not part of this kit) and was able to tell what time it was from the pilot's wristwatch.

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: Michael P.
Reviews.Content: This was a great purchase well worth the money...we have a baby on the way tqo boxer dogs and have a beautiful lanscaped yard to take pictures of...we have been having fun learning how to use this camera
